<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="u_dev_tool_operation"><u_dev_tool_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><sys_class_name>u_dev_tool_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>erik.anderson</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-02-21 14:43:04</sys_created_on><sys_id>841739752fb90110a8ce2b5df699b6d4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Sleep 30 Seconds</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Developer Tools 2.0" source="046ce6ca2f910110a8ce2b5df699b6f9">046ce6ca2f910110a8ce2b5df699b6f9</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Developer Tools 2.0">046ce6ca2f910110a8ce2b5df699b6f9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>u_dev_tool_operation_841739752fb90110a8ce2b5df699b6d4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>erik.anderson</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-02-21 14:43:39</sys_updated_on><u_active>true</u_active><u_condition/><u_conditional>false</u_conditional><u_description/><u_name>Sleep 30 Seconds</u_name><u_script><![CDATA[var currentRecord = current; //Current GlideRecord
//Each operation input is available as a variable witin this script.
//Ex: var userName = name

//Enter Code Below

var output = {
	userName: gs.getUserName(),
	userId: gs.getUserID(),
	scope: gs.getCurrentApplicationId()
};
gs.info(JSON.stringify(output));

gs.sleep(30000);

result = output;]]></u_script><u_table>global</u_table></u_dev_tool_operation></record_update>
